tool_description: Introducing the pinnacle of online betting experiences: our state-of-the-art Betting API, designed to revolutionize the way you engage with sports betting. Crafted with precision and powered by cutting-edge technology, our platform mirrors the renowned features and functionalities of industry titan Betfair, ensuring an unparalleled betting journey for enthusiasts worldwide.
name: Betfair
title: Betfair

api_list.name: Single Market
api_list.description: Here you will get single market of racing game.

api_list.name: Get Market
api_list.description:
Here you will get the market data of racing game.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

api_list.name: Get Events
api_list.description:
Here you will get event list by sport id. NOTE: The Id must need to be of racing.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

required_parameters.name: sid
required_parameters.description: This is the sports id. You can get it from home->get-all-sports-id

api_list.name: Lok Sabha Election
api_list.description:
Here you will get the data of  lok sabha election. which is a special event.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betfair14.p.rapidapi.com/api/special"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betfair14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: casino-marketbook
api_list.description: Here you will get marketbook of specific casino match.

optional_parameters.name: mid
optional_parameters.description: You will get mid from casino-odds-score and casino-result endpoint.

api_list.name: casino-result
api_list.description: Here you will get result of specific casino match

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Id of specific casino match

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betfair14.p.rapidapi.com/api/casino/1Card1Day/result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betfair14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://betfair14.p.rapidapi.com/api/casino/{id}/result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betfair14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: odds-score-v2
api_list.description: On this endpoint you will get odds score of the match.

required_parameters.name: eventId
required_parameters.description: Enter Event ID of the match. You can get event id from **Home** group.

required_parameters.name: marketId
required_parameters.description: Enter Market ID of the match. You can get Market ID from **Home** group.

api_list.name: fancy-session-v2
api_list.description: On this endpoint you will get fancy session of the match.

required_parameters.name: eventId
required_parameters.description: Enter Event ID of the match. You can get event id from **Home** group.

api_list.name: bookmaker-v2
api_list.description: On this endpoint you will get bookmaker.

required_parameters.name: marketId
required_parameters.description: Enter Market ID of the match. You can get Market ID from **Home** group.

required_parameters.name: eventId
required_parameters.description: Enter Event ID of the match. You can get event id from **Home** group.

api_list.name: market-details
api_list.description:
Here you will get market details of specific match.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**

required_parameters.name: market_id
required_parameters.description: Enter market id of match.

api_list.name: get-all-market-ids-v2

required_parameters.name: market_id
required_parameters.description: Enter the market id of the match.

api_list.description:

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**

required_parameters.name: eventid
required_parameters.description: Here you need to enter event id of specific match. You can get event id(this is basically match id) from Home group.

api_list.name: get-all-market-ids-v1
api_list.description:
Here you will get the list of market ids use it to get the actual fancy data.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**

required_parameters.name: eventid
required_parameters.description: This is Event ID of match.

api_list.description:
Here you will get the data of line market.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**

required_parameters.name: eventid

api_list.name: odds-score
api_list.description:
Here you will get odds score of the match.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

required_parameters.name: market_id
required_parameters.description: Here you need to enter Market ID of the match to get the odds score. You will get market id from **\"get-all-market-id\"** endpoint.Note: This is the endpoint where you have to make request every second to update odds score.

api_list.name: update-odds-score-of-home-page
api_list.description:
Here you will get updated odds score of home page. You need to make request here to update odds score of home page of every single match.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

required_parameters.name: market_ids
required_parameters.description: Here you need to enter list of market id of every single match.

api_list.name: matches-by-sports-id
api_list.description:
On this endpoint you will get the list of matches by sport id. Like matches of cricket, matches of football like this.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: This is the sport id. In this condition it is 4 for cricket. You can get the list of sports and their id's by making request on get-all-sports-id.

api_list.name: start-stream
api_list.description:
Here you will get the source to do live stream. NOTE: You need a player to play m3u8 live stream. example videojs, plyr.io etc

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimitd Access:**
**WhatsAp: +91 7408157036**

required_parameters.name: cid
required_parameters.description: cid stands for channelId you can get this by making request on live-stream-list. There are more endpoints where you can get this channelId

api_list.name: series-by-sport-id
api_list.description:
Here you will get the list of series by sports id.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the sports id which you can get by making request on get-all-sports-id and home group

api_list.name: matches-by-series-id
api_list.description:
Here you will get the list of matches by series id.

**Contact Developer To Get Unlimited Access:**
**WhatsApp: +91 7408157036**

required_parameters.name: sid
required_parameters.description: This is Series ID. You can get this by making request on get-all-series apart from this you can also get this by making request on all-matches, inplay-matches etc.

required_parameters.name: sportid
required_parameters.description: This is sport id. You get get this by making request on get-all-sports-id. Apart from this you can also get this from Home group.
